name: Dr. Ashok Gupta
about: Established in 1995, IIIM is amongst the top three Management & IT institutions of Rajasthan which has been imparting quality education for over a decade. The milestones achieved in this journey towards academic excellence include recognition among top 50 Business Schools in the country by the Business World survey, 2013 and CSR GHRDC survey 2008 -2014. The Institute received 'A' rating in Business Standard Best B-school Survey 2013 and 2014.
